UniprotID	P12429
Accession	P12429;B2R9W6;Q6LET2
EntryName	ANXA3_HUMAN
ProteinName	Annexin A3 (35-alpha calcimedin) (Annexin III) (Annexin-3) (Inositol 1,2-cyclic phosphate 2-phosphohydrolase) (Lipocortin III) (Placental anticoagulant protein III) (PAP-III)
GeneName	ANXA3 ANX3
Length	323
Function	Inhibitor of phospholipase A2, also possesses anti-coagulant properties. Also cleaves the cyclic bond of inositol 1,2-cyclic phosphate to form inositol 1-phosphate.
Subcellular Location
